name: .TGD File Extension
summary: Learn about .TGD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project created by Terragen, a landscape and animation generation program; contains objects, terrain, shaders, water, atmosphere, lighting, camera angles, and node network elements that make up the landscape scenes created by Terragen.

content: To create a TGD file, select File → Save or Save As..., name your file, choose your save location, verify that the File Format is TGD, and click Save.
To open a TGD file, simply double-click the file. You can also select File → Open, navigate to the TGD file, and click Open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
